headings.text: Get Started on Your Next Project, Today!
Revitalize Your Home with Bozeman Remodeling

content.scopedText:
Bozeman Home Remodeling
						
					
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Get Started on Your Next Project, Today!
						
                
                        Untitled* Email*
                            
                        Phone*Services*Tell Us About Your ProjectBathroom RemodelingKitchen RemodelingCustom Home RemodelingOther ServicesMessage
          
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
            
        
                        
                        
		                
		                

					
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						
						Revitalize Your Home with Bozeman Remodeling  
						
						
						
					
				
					
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						
						
						
						Thinking about remodeling or refinishing a part of your home? You’ve come to the right place! Bozeman Remodeling is the industry-leading remodeling and refinishing contractor  in the great state of Montana. We remodel kitchens, bathrooms, basements, garages, family rooms, living rooms, outdoor living spaces, exterior spaces, and much more—all at an unbeatable price. Whether you have a residential home or commercial property, our friendly crews will get the job done professionally and accurately. We’re based in Bozeman Montana, but our home remodeling services extend out to Belgrade, Three Forks, Livingston, Manhattan, Gallatin Gateway, and Hoppers.
						
					
				
					
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Bozeman Remodeling Main Services  
						
					
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Bathroom Remodeling
						Remodeling your bathroom can not only improve your quality of life, but it can also raise the value of your home! In fact, remodeling or refinishing a bathroom is well-known for having the highest return on investment (ROI) out of pretty much any remodeling project you can undertake! However, before you dive into a new bathroom remodel, it’s essential to have a thorough and well-thought-out plan. This is where having the help of a professional is absolutely invaluable! We have over three decades of experience handling bathroom remodeling jobs of all shapes and sizes! 
Bozeman Remodeling will walk you through every step of the remodeling process, from picking out the highest-quality materials to deciding what aesthetic would best fit with your home. Your next bathroom remodeling project doesn’t have to be overly complicated—contact Bozeman Remodeling today!
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
Full Assessment & Planning 
Refurbish & Repair 
Tile & Vanity Options  
Plumbing Replacement & Repair 
Multiple Material Options 
Flooring Refurbish & Repair 
Bathroom Cabinet Installation 
Fixture & Accessory Repair 

			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Kitchen Remodeling 
						The kitchen is often the first place you go when coming home from work or even getting up in the morning. It’s a place to spend time with your family, eat great food, and make great memories that last a lifetime. At Bozeman Remodeling, we understand the nuance of a great kitchen. A dull or broken-down kitchen can make the area feel less inviting and more like a means to an end. What can you do if your kitchen is starting to feel this way? Have your kitchen remodeled! A complete or partial remodel is often the best solution to return your kitchen to its former glory. 
Similar to our bathroom remodeling service, we’ll help you decide what you need to do to make your kitchen great again.  Contact Bozeman Remodeling today, and one of our service members will be happy to walk you through any questions you may have! 
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
Custom Kitchen Designs 
General Kitchen Repair 
Versatile Flooring Options 
Flooring Repair 
Custom Cabinets Installation 
Tear Down & Refurbish 
Endless Accessory Options 
Kitchen Fixture Repair 

			
			
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Custom Home Remodeling 
						Though bathrooms and kitchens are the two most popular remodeling choices, practically every aspect of your home can be remodeled! Whether you have a brand-new home that’s lacking in personal “flair,” an older home with rooms in desperate need of remodeling, or simply have an exciting custom design idea, Bozeman Remodeling is here to help! Our custom home remodeling service covers everything from basements and flooring to outdoor spaces and home additions! 
Not many contractors offer custom remodeling services, and when they do, they often sub out the work to less-experienced crews. At Bozeman Remodeling, we have the necessary knowledge to do practically every job ourselves. On the off chance you come to us with something beyond our immediate knowledge, we are very selective about what specialists we choose to bring on. We handpick only the highest-quality subcontractors, and even supervise their work! With Bozeman Remodeling, you’ll be getting the most excellent crews, flexible prices, and the best custom home remodeling services in the state! 
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
Expert Custom Designs 
No Subcontractor Work 
Home-Owner Designs 
Refurbish & Repairs
Practical Design Options 
Interior & Exterior 
Choose Your Own Materials 
Flexible Pricing Options 

			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Why Choose Bozeman Remodeling?
						
					
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						About Bozeman Remodeling
						Bozeman Remodeling has over 30 years of experience remodeling and refinishing homes in Bozeman, Helena, Missoula, Billings, and surrounding areas.  At Bozeman Remodeling, we love starting a new project and watch it all come together. Seeing that satisfied look on a customer’s face as they walk into their brand-new kitchen, bathroom, or addition is an endlessly rewarding experience. We wouldn’t trade that for anything!  
					
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Three Decades of Experience 
						With over 30 years of experience handling remodeling jobs of all types, you can count on Bozeman Remodeling to get the job done right. 
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Fully Licensed & Certified  
						Bozeman Remodeling is a fully licensed, bonded, and insured construction contractor in Montana.  
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Remodeling Industry Leader 
						We’re the industry leaders in Montana, with thousands of successfully completed remodeling projects in homes scattered across the entire state. 
					
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Complete Remodeling Services 
						BR remodels kitchens, bathrooms, rooms, exterior spaces, and more—you name it, we can remodel it. 
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Custom Designs  
						Bozeman Remodeling provides expert custom designs suitable for any home, and we’ll work with you if you have a custom design of your own. 
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Free Estimates  
						Our remodeling estimates are always free and never include any hidden or additional fees. 
					
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
			
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Bathroom Remodeling 
						
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				A bathroom remodel is one of the best ways to both revitalize your living space and improve the value of your home. 
More >> 
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Kitchen Remodeling  
						
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Remodeling your kitchen can be a difficult and expensive undertaking—but not if you choose the right contractor! Bozeman Remodeling has remodeled thousands of kitchens, and we’re willing to work out a plan that fits with your budget. 
More >> 
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Custom Additions  
						
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Thinking about making your kitchen bigger? Want to expand your home gym? Or add an extra room for a newborn nursery? BR can make it happen with our custom addition services! 
More >> 
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
					
					
						Basement Finishing  
						
					
				
			
				
				
				
				
				Though it’s often underappreciated, your basement is an important aspect of your home. It can extend the feel of your main floor or even act as a home within itself. If your basement is unfinished or you’d like it refinished, Basement Remodeling are the experts to contact.  
More >> 
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
			
			
				
				
				
				
			
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				
				At Bozeman Remodeling, we love starting a new project and watch it all come together. Seeing that satisfied look on a customer’s face as they walk into their brand-new kitchen, bathroom, or addition is an endlessly rewarding experience. We wouldn’t trade that for anything!
